guard.title: PIN Verification
guard.subtitle: Please enter your PIN code to continue
guard.lockedMessage: The application has been locked for security reasons. Please enter your PIN code to unlock.
guard.accountLocked: Your account has been temporarily locked. Please sign in again.
guard.confirmPinDescription: To access the application, please confirm your PIN code

verification.title: Verify your PIN code
verification.description: Please enter your PIN code to access the application
verification.instructions: For security reasons, please enter your PIN code
verification.tooManyAttempts: Too many incorrect attempts. For security reasons, you must create a new PIN code.
verification.forgotPin: Forgot PIN code? Create a new one

creation.title: Create a PIN code
creation.instructionsVerify: Please confirm your existing PIN code to verify that you remember it.
creation.instructionsCreate: Choose a PIN code that does not contain 4 identical digits or numeric sequences.
creation.instructionsConfirm: Confirm your PIN code to verify that you remember it.

validation.length: PIN code must be exactly 4 digits
validation.numeric: PIN code must contain only digits
validation.weakPinMessage: This PIN code is too easy to guess. Please choose another one.

errors.lockoutError: Account locked due to multiple attempts

toast.pinCreatedDescription: Your PIN code has been created successfully
toast.pinSavedDescription: Your PIN code has been saved successfully
toast.pinStoredDescription: Your PIN code has been saved successfully
toast.pinVerifiedDescription: Your PIN code has been verified successfully
toast.pinUpdatedDescription: Your PIN code has been updated successfully
toast.incorrectPinDescription: The PIN code you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
toast.lockedDescription: Your account has been temporarily locked. Please sign in again.
toast.pinRemovedDescription: Your PIN code has been removed successfully

sessionTimer.title: Session expired
sessionTimer.message: Your session has expired for security reasons
sessionTimer.reenterPin: Please enter your PIN code again
sessionTimer.warningMessage: Your session will expire in {{seconds}} seconds
sessionTimer.autoLockMessage: The application will be locked after {{minutes}} minutes of inactivity
